# setUpNext(_:)

**Type Method**

Returns a queue change for a new up-next item.

## Declaration

```swift
static func setUpNext(_ item: GroupSessionEvent.Action.QueueChange.Item) -> GroupSessionEvent.Action.QueueChange
```

## Parameters

- **item**: The next item in the queue.

## Return Value

A type that contains information about the change.

## Discussion

Before showing a notice to the user, call this method to generate a type for the changed up-next item. Pass this type to the [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupSessionEvent/Action-swift.struct/updatedQueue(_:)] method to create the postable action.

## Specifying the type of change

- **added(_:)**: Returns a queue change for an added item.
